summary: Professional international accounting website for JP Global Accounting. Single-page premium site with deep navy blue and gold color scheme on clean white background. Features hero section, about, 6 service blocks (bookkeeping, financial reporting, taxation support, payroll, QuickBooks/Xero, bank reconciliation), why choose us, mission/vision, and contact sections. Targets US, UK, and Australian businesses with 15+ years of expertise.
architectural_notes: Single-page website structure with smooth scrolling navigation
Deep navy blue (#0F172A) primary color with gold (#D4AF37) accents on clean white background
Modern minimal elegant design with strong spacing and structured sections
Corporate finance background images for premium trustworthy aesthetic
Responsive layout optimized for international business clients
imageRequirements:
## Required Images
- Professional corporate finance office background with modern workspace, suitable for hero section banner (hero-finance.dim_1920x800.png)
- Premium JP Global Accounting logo with navy blue and gold color scheme, minimal design (logo-jpglobal.dim_200x80.png)
- Elegant accounting services illustration showing financial documents and calculators in navy and gold tones (services-bg.dim_1200x600.png)
- Professional international business handshake or global collaboration image for about section (about-global.dim_1200x600.png)
- Modern office desk with financial reports and laptop for mission/vision section background (mission-vision-bg.dim_1200x600.png)

existing_features.title: Implement Home page with hero section displaying headline '15+ Years of Trusted International Accounting Expertise', subheading 'Professional bookkeeping and taxation services for US, UK & Australian businesses', and 'Request Free Consultation' call-to-action button
Create About Us page highlighting 15+ years of experience, focus on accuracy, compliance, confidentiality, and international accounting standards knowledge

Build Services page with two main sections: Bookkeeping Services (Full-Charge Bookkeeping, Bank & Credit Card Reconciliation, Accounts Payable & Receivable, Payroll Processing, Financial Statements, QuickBooks & Xero Support) and Taxation Services (US Sales Tax Support, UK VAT Assistance, Australian BAS Support, Tax Preparation Assistance, Year-End Reporting, Compliance Documentation)

Create Mission & Vision page displaying Mission statement 'Provide accurate, transparent and dependable bookkeeping & taxation solutions globally' and Vision statement 'Become a trusted long-term financial partner for international businesses'
Implement Why Choose Us section featuring five differentiators: 15+ Years Experience, International Compliance Knowledge, Secure & Confidential, On-Time Delivery, and Long-Term Partnership Approach
Add Testimonials section with 3 professional 5-star client testimonials representing clients from US, UK, and Australia
Create Contact page with email, WhatsApp, LinkedIn contact options and a contact form for inquiries

Implement footer across all pages containing SEO text: 'International Bookkeeping & Tax Services | US Accounting Support | UK VAT Specialist | Australian BAS Expert | Remote Accounting Services | QuickBooks & Xero Experts'

Apply premium corporate visual theme throughout the site using primary color black, accent color gold, secondary accent dark green, with smooth scrolling, modern serif and sans-serif font combination, and clean luxury minimal corporate aesthetic
Implement site navigation allowing users to access Home, About Us, Services, Mission & Vision, and Contact pages seamlessly

Update site-wide color scheme from current black (#0A0A0A) and gold (#D4AF37) to Deep Navy Blue (#0F172A) as primary color and Gold (#D4AF37) as accent color, maintaining clean white background throughout
Update Home page hero section headline to '15+ Years of International Accounting & Tax Expertise' and subheading to 'Trusted Bookkeeping & Tax Solutions for US, UK & Australia Businesses'
Change hero section call-to-action button text from 'Request Free Consultation' to 'Get Free Consultation' with strong gold styling

Update Services page to display exactly 6 service blocks in the following order: Bookkeeping Services, Financial Reporting, Taxation Support (US Sales Tax, UK VAT, AUS BAS), Payroll Processing, QuickBooks & Xero, and Bank Reconciliation
Add About section to Home page describing JP Global Accounting as an experienced international accounting partner helping businesses stay compliant and financially organized
Update Why Choose Us section content to explicitly highlight: 15+ years experience, international compliance knowledge, data confidentiality, accuracy, and global remote support
Update Mission & Vision page to use professional corporate tone aligned with international accounting consulting firm positioning
Update Contact page to display email jpfinance6419@gmail.com and WhatsApp number +91 9081710470 with strong call-to-action buttons
Update company branding throughout site from generic 'JP Accounting' to 'JP Global Accounting' in all navigation, headers, footers, and page content
Enhance overall layout with stronger spacing, more structured sections, and minimal elegant design principles to achieve premium corporate consulting appearance
